items.title: WATCH:  Ski and snowboard duo turn Boston streets into winter playground
items.description: This ski and snowboard duo took advantage of the fresh powder in Boston over the weekend, turning the city's streets into a winter playground.

items.title: Kristi Noem met with Trump amid scrutiny over deadly Minneapolis shooting: Sources
items.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem met with President Trump on Monday, sources told ABC News, amid fallout the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in M...

items.title: Alexander brothers trial: Prosecution paints trio as predators, not party boys
items.description: Alon, Oren and Tal Alexander face federal sex trafficking charges.

items.title: WATCH:  President Trump calls fatal shooting of Alex Pretti 'a very sad situation'
items.description: Trump told ABC News' Mary Bruce that the fatal shooting of 37-year-old Alex Pretti by a federal agent in Minneapolis is a "very sad situation."

items.title: WATCH:  Backup of 18-wheelers on Louisiana highway in aftermath of winter storm
